script.name: ds_ws.addValidationErrorsToFailureArrayForSub_UpdInWD
script.label: Add Validation Errors To Failure Array For Submit Or Update In WD
script.script: return ds_ws.addValidationErrorsToFailureArray(validationErrors, objectId, failureArray,"VALIDATION ERROR", (isSubmit ? "SUBMIT ORDER" : "UPDATE ORDER"), "Workflow Director");
